key.name: enabled-styles
key.description: List of CSS files in style/bundled/ that are currently applied.

key.name: custom-styles
key.description: An array of tuples containing the file URI and its enabled state.

key.name: indicator-enabled
key.summary: Show the extension indicator in the panel

key.name: indicator-custom-icon
key.summary: Custom icon path for the main indicator

key.name: showapps-enabled
key.summary: Enable the Show Applications button in top panel
key.description: Completely disable this feature if turned off

key.name: showapps-position
key.summary: Where to place the Show Apps button
key.description: replace = hide Activities text, after = insert button after it, before = insert button before it

key.name: showapps-custom-icon
key.description: Full path to SVG/PNG/JPG. Empty string = use default view-app-grid-symbolic
